verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निं वो देवयज्यया अग्निं प्रयत्यध्वरे। अग्निं होतारमीळते॥
verses.transliteration: agniṃ vo devayajyayā agniṃ prayaty adhvare | agniṃ hotāram īḷate ||
verses.translation_english: Agni do men invoke for worship, Agni at sacrifice duly performed; Agni the Hotar they praise.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निः पूर्वेभिरृषिभिरीड्यो नूतनैरुत। स देवाँ एह वक्षति॥
verses.transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir īḍyo nūtanair uta | sa devān eha vakṣati ||
verses.translation_english: Agni, praised by ancient seers and by those of today, may he bring the gods here.

verses.transliteration: agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva divedive | yaśasaṃ vīravattamam ||
verses.translation_english: Through Agni one gains wealth and nourishment day by day, glorious and most rich in heroes.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने यं यज्ञमध्वरं विश्वतः परिभूरसि। स इद्देवेषु गच्छति॥
verses.transliteration: agne yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi | sa id deveṣu gacchati ||
verses.translation_english: O Agni, the sacrifice which thou encompassest on every side, that indeed goes among the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होता कविक्रतुः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः। देवो देवेभिरा गमत्॥
verses.transliteration: agnir hotā kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ | devo devebhir ā gamat ||
verses.translation_english: Agni, the Hotar, of wise resolve, most truthful, of glorious fame—may the god come with the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: यदङ्ग दाशुषे त्वमग्ने भद्रं करिष्यसि। तवेत्तत्सत्यमङ्गिरः॥
verses.transliteration: yadaṅga dāśuṣe tvam agne bhadraṃ kariṣyasi | tavet tat satyam aṅgiraḥ ||
verses.translation_english: Whatever blessing thou, O Agni, wilt grant to the worshipper, that, O Angiras, is thy true gift.

verses.sanskrit_text: उप त्वाग्ने दिवेदिवे दोषावस्तर्धिया वयम्। नमो भरन्त एमसि॥
verses.transliteration: upa tvāgne divedive doṣāvastar dhiyā vayam | namo bharanta emasī ||
verses.translation_english: To thee, O Agni, day by day, at evening and at dawn, we come with reverence.

verses.sanskrit_text: राजन्तमध्वराणां गोपामृतस्य दीदिविम्। वर्धमानं स्वे दमे॥
verses.transliteration: rājantam adhvarāṇāṃ gopām ṛtasya dīdivim | vardhamānaṃ sve dame ||
verses.translation_english: Shining ruler of sacrifices, guardian of the cosmic order, growing in thine own house.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नः पितेव सूनवेऽग्ने सुपायनो भव। सचस्वा नः स्वस्तये॥
verses.transliteration: sa naḥ piteva sūnave agne supāyano bhava | sacasvā naḥ svastaye ||
verses.translation_english: So be to us, O Agni, as a father to his son; be easy of access to us for our welfare.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने त्वं पारया नव्यो अस्मान्स्वस्तिभिरति दुर्गाणि विश्वा। पूश्च पृथ्वी बहुला न उर्वी भव तोकाय तनयाय शं योः॥
verses.transliteration: agne tvaṃ pārayā navyo asmān svastibhir ati durgāṇi viśvā | pūś ca pṛthvī bahulā na urvī bhava tokāya tanayāya śaṃ yoḥ ||
verses.translation_english: O Agni, carry us safely over all hardships with thy auspicious powers. May the wide earth and heaven be gracious to us and to our offspring.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने नय सुपथा राये अस्मान् विश्वानि देव वयुनानि विद्वान्। युयोध्यस्मज्जुहुराणमेनो भूयिष्ठां ते नमउक्तिं विधेम॥
verses.transliteration: agne naya supathā rāye asmān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān | yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te nama uktiṃ vidhema ||
verses.translation_english: O Agni, lead us by the good path to prosperity, O god who knowest all ways. Remove from us crooked sin. To thee we offer our highest reverence.

verses.sanskrit_text: शं नो मित्रः शं वरुणः शं नो भवत्वर्यमा। शं न इन्द्रो बृहस्पतिः शं नो विष्णुरुरुक्रमः॥
verses.transliteration: śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃ no bhavatv aryamā | śaṃ na indro bṛhaspatiḥ śaṃ no viṣṇur urukramaḥ ||
verses.translation_english: May Mitra bless us, and Varuna; may Aryaman bless us; may Indra and Brihaspati bless us; may Vishnu of wide stride bless us.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निं होतारं मनुषः सपर्यन्ति धीतिभिः। यज्ञस्य देवमृत्विजम्॥
verses.transliteration: agniṃ hotāraṃ manuṣaḥ saparyanti dhītibhiḥ | yajñasya devam ṛtvijam ||
verses.translation_english: Men worship Agni the Hotar with their thoughts, the divine ministrant of the sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो मित्रो न वरुणो न अर्यमा स न इन्द्रो बृहस्पतिः। स नः शिवो मरुतां गणः॥
verses.transliteration: sa no mitro na varuṇo na aryamā sa na indro bṛhaspatiḥ | sa naḥ śivo marutāṃ gaṇaḥ ||
verses.translation_english: May he be for us like Mitra, like Varuna, like Aryaman; like Indra and Brihaspati; like the gracious host of the Maruts.

verses.sanskrit_text: यज्ञस्य केतुं प्रथमं पुरोहितं हविष्मन्तः सपर्यन्ति धीतिभिः॥
verses.transliteration: yajñasya ketuṃ prathamaṃ purohitaṃ haviṣmantaḥ saparyanti dhītibhiḥ ||
verses.translation_english: Him, the first sign of sacrifice, the household priest, men with offerings worship with devotion.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निः पूर्वेभिरृषिभिरीड्यो नूतनैरुत। स देवाँ एह वक्षति॥
verses.transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir īḍyo nūtanair uta | sa devān eha vakṣati ||
verses.translation_english: Agni, praised by ancient and modern seers, will bring the gods here.

verses.transliteration: agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva divedive | yaśasaṃ vīravattamam ||
verses.translation_english: Through Agni one gains wealth and nourishment day by day, glorious and rich in heroes.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने यं यज्ञमध्वरं विश्वतः परिभूरसि। स इद्देवेषु गच्छति॥
verses.transliteration: agne yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi | sa id deveṣu gacchati ||
verses.translation_english: O Agni, the sacrifice which you encompass on all sides goes surely among the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होता कविक्रतुः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः। देवो देवेभिरा गमत्॥
verses.transliteration: agnir hotā kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ | devo devebhir ā gamat ||
verses.translation_english: Agni the Hotar, wise and true, of most splendid fame—may he come with the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: यदङ्ग दाशुषे त्वमग्ने भद्रं करिष्यसि। तवेत्तत्सत्यमङ्गिरः॥
verses.transliteration: yadaṅga dāśuṣe tvam agne bhadraṃ kariṣyasi | tavet tat satyam aṅgiraḥ ||
verses.translation_english: Whatever blessing thou wilt grant the worshipper, O Agni, that is thy true gift.

verses.sanskrit_text: उप त्वाग्ने दिवेदिवे दोषावस्तर्धिया वयम्। नमो भरन्त एमसि॥
verses.transliteration: upa tvāgne divedive doṣāvastar dhiyā vayam | namo bharanta emasī ||
verses.translation_english: To thee, O Agni, day by day, at evening and at dawn, we come with reverence.

verses.sanskrit_text: राजन्तमध्वराणां गोपामृतस्य दीदिविम्। वर्धमानं स्वे दमे॥
verses.transliteration: rājantam adhvarāṇāṃ gopām ṛtasya dīdivim | vardhamānaṃ sve dame ||
verses.translation_english: Shining ruler of sacrifices, guardian of sacred order, growing in his own abode.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नः पितेव सूनवेऽग्ने सुपायनो भव। सचस्वा नः स्वस्तये॥
verses.transliteration: sa naḥ piteva sūnave agne supāyano bhava | sacasvā naḥ svastaye ||
verses.translation_english: Be to us like a father to his son, O Agni; be easy of access for our welfare.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निः दीर्घं ददर्श व्योम्नि स्थीतं रविर्भूतः शुभ्रः।
verses.transliteration: agniḥ dīrghaṃ dadarśa vyomni sthītaṃ ravir bhūtaḥ śubhraḥ
verses.translation_english: To him who shines afar, Vaisvanara, shall the bards give precious things that he may go on certain paths: for Agni the Immortal serves the Deities.

verses.sanskrit_text: स ब्रह्मणो व्याप्नोति भूमं दिवं च विशन्तमागतः।
verses.transliteration: sa brahmaṇo vyāpnoti bhūmaṃ divaṃ ca viśantam āgataḥ
verses.translation_english: He, wondrous envoy, goes between the earth and heaven, firm seated as the Herald, great High Priest of men.

verses.sanskrit_text: विश्वा ऋतूनि समायान्ति यज्ञस्योत्तरायणि हि ते।
verses.transliteration: viśvā ṛtūni samāyānti yajñas yottarāyaṇi hi te
verses.translation_english: Sages shall glorify Agni with earnest thoughts, ensign of sacrifice, who fills the synod full: in whom the singers have stored up their holy acts.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निरास्मान् दिवं च पृथिवीं ययात् स्वधाम अनुवर्तयन्।
verses.transliteration: agnir āsma an divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ yayāt svadhāma anuvartayan
verses.translation_english: The Sire of sacrifice, great God of holy bards, Agni, measure and symbol of the priests, hath entered heaven and earth that show in varied form.

verses.transliteration: bhuvanasy oṣadhīnām adhi agnir vyadhatta sumnāni ratā
verses.translation_english: Bright Agni with the bright car, Lord of green domains, Vaisvanara dwelling in the floods, who finds the light.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्जातवेदसो हन्तारो दिवि स पृथि वर्तते।
verses.transliteration: agnir jātavedaso hantāro divi sa pṛthu vartate
verses.translation_english: Pervading, swift and wide, encompassed round with powers, him very glorious have the Gods established here.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो देवासुरं धत्ते सावितुर्विधें सुकरिष्यसे।
verses.transliteration: sa no devāsuraṃ dhatte sāvitur vidhe su kariṣyase
verses.translation_english: Agni, thou who art established in glory, grant us wealth and lead us to the well‑timed rites.

verses.sanskrit_text: तव कामं समारभं यस्य कामा मद्विदा न ते भुवि।
verses.transliteration: tava kāmaṃ samārabhaṃ yasya kāmā madvidā na te bhuvi
verses.translation_english: He who knows the eternal rites of sacrifice and true desires of men, may Agni grant us strength.

verses.sanskrit_text: यज्ञमुच्चैः प्रतिष्ठां दधन् भागां मागधा न उर्वी समा।
verses.transliteration: yajñam uccaiḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ dadhan bhāgā māgadhā na urvī samā
verses.translation_english: With strong song and noble offering let our rites stand firm; may our share of blessings be wide.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो मित्रः स नो वरुणः स नो भवान अर्यमानोऽग्निः।
verses.transliteration: sa no mitraḥ sa no varuṇaḥ sa no bhavān aryamāno agniḥ
verses.translation_english: May Mitra, Varuna, and Aryaman, and Agni himself be beneficial to us.

verses.sanskrit_text: शं नो देवा ऋतवः सन्तु विश्वे ऋतवस्ति नः सह।
verses.transliteration: śaṃ no devā ṛtavaḥ santu viśve ṛtavas ti naḥ saha
verses.translation_english: May all the gods, bestowers of cosmic order, be with us in harmony.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निं यो देवमनु यजते तस्य शुभं करिष्यति।
verses.transliteration: agniṃ yo devam anu yajate tasya śubhaṃ kariṣyati
verses.translation_english: Whosoever worships Agni, the divine, shall have blessings and prosperity.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निः पूर्वेभिरृषिभिरीड्यो नूतनैरुत। स देवाँ एह वक्षति॥
verses.transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir īḍyo nūtanair uta | sa devān eha vakṣati
verses.translation_english: Agni, praised by ancient seers and by those of today, brings the gods here.

verses.transliteration: agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva divedive | yaśasaṃ vīravattamam
verses.translation_english: Through Agni one gains wealth and nourishment day by day, glorious and rich in heroes.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने यं यज्ञमध्वरं विश्वतः परिभूरसि। स इद्देवेषु गच्छति॥
verses.transliteration: agne yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi | sa id deveṣu gacchati
verses.translation_english: O Agni, the sacrifice which thou encompassest on all sides goes surely among the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होता कविक्रतुः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः। देवो देवेभिरा गमत्॥
verses.transliteration: agnir hotā kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ | devo devebhir ā gamat
verses.translation_english: Agni the Hotar, wise and true, of most splendid fame—may he come with the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: यदङ्ग दाशुषे त्वमग्ने भद्रं करिष्यसि। तवेत्तत्सत्यमङ्गिरः॥
verses.transliteration: yadaṅga dāśuṣe tvam agne bhadraṃ kariṣyasi | tavet tat satyam aṅgiraḥ
verses.translation_english: Whatever blessing thou grantest to the worshipper, O Agni, that is thy true gift.

verses.sanskrit_text: उप त्वाग्ने दिवेदिवे दोषावस्तर्धिया वयम्। नमो भरन्त एमसि॥
verses.transliteration: upa tvāgne divedive doṣāvastar dhiyā vayam | namo bharanta emasī
verses.translation_english: To thee, O Agni, day by day, at evening and at dawn, we come with reverence.

verses.sanskrit_text: राजन्तमध्वराणां गोपामृतस्य दीदिविम्। वर्धमानं स्वे दमे॥
verses.transliteration: rājantam adhvarāṇāṃ gopām ṛtasya dīdivim | vardhamānaṃ sve dame
verses.translation_english: Shining ruler of sacrifices, guardian of sacred order, growing in his own abode.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नः पितेव सूनवेऽग्ने सुपायनो भव। सचस्वा नः स्वस्तये॥
verses.transliteration: sa naḥ piteva sūnave agne supāyano bhava | sacasvā naḥ svastaye
verses.translation_english: Be to us like a father to his son, O Agni; be easy of access for our welfare.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्भद्रं यच्छति ते यज्ञेषु सदा वरुणो वरुणः।
verses.transliteration: agnir bhadraṃ yacchati te yajñeṣu sadā varuṇo varuṇaḥ
verses.translation_english: Agni grants auspiciousness in sacrifice, as Varuna ever bestows goodness.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निः पूर्वेभिरृषिभिर्युते देवेषु चोत्तमः। यशसं वीरवत्तमम्॥
verses.transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir yute deveṣu cottamaḥ | yaśasaṃ vīravattamam
verses.translation_english: Agni, with the seers of old, most excellent among the gods, is glorious and heroic.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो मित्रो न वरुणो न अर्यमा स न इन्द्रो बृहस्पतिः।
verses.transliteration: sa no mitro na varuṇo na aryamā sa na indro bṛhaspatiḥ
verses.translation_english: May Mitra, Varuna, Aryaman, Indra, and Brihaspati be kind to us.

verses.sanskrit_text: शं नो देवा ऋतवः सन्तु विश्वे ऋतवस्ति नः सह।
verses.transliteration: śaṃ no devā ṛtavaḥ santu viśve ṛtavas ti naḥ saha
verses.translation_english: May all the gods, guardians of cosmic order, be with us.

verses.transliteration: agnir mitra varuṇaś ca sanno bhavatu mitra varuṇaḥ
verses.translation_english: Agni, Mitra, and Varuna, may they be auspicious to us.

verses.sanskrit_text: शं नो विश्वदेवाः शं नो विश्वे ऋतवः सन्तु।
verses.transliteration: śaṃ no viśvadevāḥ śaṃ no viśve ṛtavaḥ santu
verses.translation_english: May all the gods and all cosmic laws be auspicious and in harmony with us.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निं यं देवमनु यजते स नो भवतु शुभ्रः।
verses.transliteration: agniṃ yaṃ devam anu yajate sa no bhavatu śubhraḥ
verses.translation_english: Whosoever worships Agni, the divine, may he grant us auspiciousness.

verses.translation_english: To thee, O Agni, day by day, at evening and at dawn, we come with reverence.

verses.sanskrit_text: राजन्तमध्वराणां गोपामृतस्य दीदिविम्। वर्धमानं स्वे दमे॥
verses.transliteration: rājantam adhvarāṇāṃ gopām ṛtasya dīdivim | vardhamānaṃ sve dame
verses.translation_english: Shining ruler of sacrifices, guardian of sacred order, growing in his own abode.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नः पितेव सूनवेऽग्ने सुपायनो भव। सचस्वा नः स्वस्तये॥
verses.transliteration: sa naḥ piteva sūnave agne supāyano bhava | sacasvā naḥ svastaye
verses.translation_english: Be to us like a father to his son, O Agni; be easy of access for our welfare.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्भद्रं यच्छति ते यज्ञेषु सदा वरुणो वरुणः।
verses.transliteration: agnir bhadraṃ yacchati te yajñeṣu sadā varuṇo varuṇaḥ
verses.translation_english: Agni grants auspiciousness in sacrifice, as Varuna ever bestows goodness.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निः पूर्वेभिरृषिभिर्युते देवेषु चोत्तमः। यशसं वीरवत्तमम्॥
verses.transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir yute deveṣu cottamaḥ | yaśasaṃ vīravattamam
verses.translation_english: Agni, with the seers of old, most excellent among the gods, is glorious and heroic.

verses.transliteration: agniḥ suparṇo divi savitā vardhamānaḥ
verses.translation_english: Agni, swift-winged, shining in heaven, grows in power and influence.

verses.transliteration: agnir hotā kavikratuḥ yajñeṣu purukṣitaḥ
verses.translation_english: Agni the Hotar, wise and resolute, presides over the sacrifices of men.

verses.transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir yute deveṣu cottamaḥ
verses.translation_english: Agni, praised by seers of old, excels among the gods.

verses.transliteration: agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva divedive
verses.translation_english: Through Agni one attains wealth and nourishment day by day.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्भद्रं यच्छति ते यज्ञेषु सदा वरुणो वरुणः।
verses.transliteration: agnir bhadraṃ yacchati te yajñeṣu sadā varuṇo varuṇaḥ
verses.translation_english: Agni grants auspiciousness in sacrifice, as Varuna ever bestows goodness.

verses.transliteration: upa tvāgne divedive doṣāvastar dhiyā vayam
verses.translation_english: To thee, O Agni, day by day, at evening and dawn, we come with reverence.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नः पितेव सूनवेऽग्ने सुपायनो भव।
verses.transliteration: sa naḥ piteva sūnave agne supāyano bhava
verses.translation_english: Be to us like a father to his son, O Agni.

verses.transliteration: rājantam adhvarāṇāṃ gopām ṛtasya dīdivim
verses.translation_english: Shining ruler of sacrifices, guardian of sacred order.

verses.transliteration: agne yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi
verses.translation_english: O Agni, the sacrifice which you encompass on all sides goes among the gods.

verses.transliteration: agnir hotā kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ
verses.translation_english: Agni, the Hotar, wise and true, most splendid among the gods.

verses.transliteration: yadaṅga dāśuṣe tvam agne bhadraṃ kariṣyasi
verses.translation_english: Whatever blessing thou grantest to the worshipper, O Agni, that is thy true gift.

verses.sanskrit_text: शं नो देवा ऋतवः सन्तु विश्वे ऋतवस्ति नः सह।
verses.transliteration: śaṃ no devā ṛtavaḥ santu viśve ṛtavas ti naḥ saha
verses.translation_english: May all the gods, guardians of cosmic order, be with us.

verses.transliteration: agniṃ yajñeṣu sarveṣu samāyāti śubhraḥ
verses.translation_english: Agni, the pure, is present in all sacrifices.

verses.transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir yute deveṣu cottamaḥ
verses.translation_english: Agni, praised by the ancient seers, excels among the gods.

verses.transliteration: agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva divedive
verses.translation_english: Through Agni one gains wealth and nourishment day by day.

verses.translation_english: Shining ruler of sacrifices, guardian of sacred order.

verses.translation_english: O Agni, the sacrifice which you encompass on all sides goes among the gods.

verses.translation_english: Agni, the Hotar, wise and true, most splendid among the gods.

verses.transliteration: yadaṅga dāśuṣe tvam agne bhadraṃ kariṣyasi
verses.translation_english: Whatever blessing thou grantest to the worshipper, O Agni, that is thy true gift.

verses.sanskrit_text: शं नो देवा ऋतवः सन्तु विश्वे ऋतवस्ति नः सह।
verses.transliteration: śaṃ no devā ṛtavaḥ santu viśve ṛtavas ti naḥ saha
verses.translation_english: May all the gods, guardians of cosmic order, be with us.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होता पुरोहितोऽध्वरस्य विचर्षणिः। स वेद यज्ञमानुषक्॥
verses.transliteration: agnir hotā purohito 'dhvarasya vicarṣaṇiḥ | sa veda yajñam ānuṣak ||
verses.translation_english: Agni is priest and minister of sacrifice, the Hotar, who knows the ways of men.

verses.transliteration: sa hi devo amartyo duvasyaty adhvarān |
verses.translation_english: For he, the God immortal, duly worships the rites.

verses.transliteration: agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanad draviṇasyur dadhe rayim |
verses.translation_english: Agni has struck down Vritras; the giver of treasure, he bestows wealth.

verses.transliteration: agniṃ vo devayajyayā gṛṇānā yajñavāhasam |
verses.translation_english: With sacred worship sing ye to Agni, the bearer of oblations.

verses.sanskrit_text: तं त्वा हि शश्वतीनां विश्वां जातानां पतिम्।
verses.transliteration: taṃ tvā hi śaśvatīnām viśvāṃ jātānāṃ patim |
verses.translation_english: Thee, lord of all that has been born and of eternal generations.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने त्वं नो अन्तम उत त्राता शिवो भव।
verses.transliteration: agne tvaṃ no antama uta trātā śivo bhava |
verses.translation_english: Be thou our nearest friend, O Agni, and our deliverer, auspicious one.

verses.transliteration: sa naḥ pāvaka dīdihi viśvāny arātiḥ |
verses.translation_english: Shine for us, O purifier, and repel all hostility.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने यज्ञस्य सुक्रतो विश्वानि देव वायुनि।
verses.transliteration: agne yajñasya sukrato viśvāni deva vāyuni |
verses.translation_english: O Agni of good resolve, divine, know all the works of sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_text: यज्ञं नो अध्वरं वह देवेभ्यो हव्यवाहन।
verses.transliteration: yajñaṃ no adhvaraṃ vaha devebhyo havyavāhana |
verses.translation_english: Bring our sacrifice to the Gods, O bearer of offerings.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने सुपायनो भव सचा स्वस्तये सदा।
verses.transliteration: agne supāyano bhava sacā svastaye sadā |
verses.translation_english: Be easy of approach to us, O Agni, for our welfare evermore.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होता पुरोहितोऽध्वरस्य विचर्षणिः। स वेद यज्ञमानुषक्॥
verses.transliteration: agnir hotā purohito 'dhvarasya vicarṣaṇiḥ | sa veda yajñam ānuṣak ||
verses.translation_english: Agni, the Hotar and household priest of the sacrifice, knows the ways of men and the ritual.

verses.transliteration: agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanad draviṇasyur dadhe rayim |
verses.translation_english: Agni has struck down obstructions and bestows treasures upon men.

verses.transliteration: agniṃ vo devayajyayā gṛṇānā yajñavāhasam |
verses.translation_english: We worship Agni with song, the bearer of offerings to the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: स त्वा हि शश्वतीनां विश्वां जातानां पतिम्।
verses.transliteration: sa tvā hi śaśvatīnām viśvāṃ jātānāṃ patim |
verses.translation_english: Thee, lord of all that is born and of eternal generations, we praise.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने त्वं नो अन्तमुत त्राता शिवो भव।
verses.transliteration: agne tvaṃ no antamut trātā śivo bhava |
verses.translation_english: Be our nearest friend, O Agni, our protector and auspicious one.

verses.transliteration: sa naḥ pāvaka dīdihi viśvāny arātiḥ |
verses.translation_english: Shine for us, O purifier, and drive away all adversities.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने यज्ञस्य सुक्रतो विश्वानि देव वायुनि।
verses.transliteration: agne yajñasya sukrato viśvāni deva vāyuni |
verses.translation_english: O Agni, endowed with good resolve, divine, know all the workings of sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_text: यज्ञं नो अध्वरं वह देवेभ्यो हव्यवाहन।
verses.transliteration: yajñaṃ no adhvaraṃ vaha devebhyo havyavāhana |
verses.translation_english: Bring our offerings to the gods, O bearer of oblations.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने सुपायनो भव सचा स्वस्तये सदा।
verses.transliteration: agne supāyano bhava sacā svastaye sadā |
verses.translation_english: Be easy of approach to us, O Agni, and ever present for our welfare.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होता पुरोहितोऽध्वरस्य विचर्षणिः। स वेद यज्ञमानुषक्॥
verses.transliteration: agnir hotā purohito 'dhvarasya vicarṣaṇiḥ | sa veda yajñam ānuṣak ||
verses.translation_english: Agni, the Hotar, priest of the sacrifice, moves among men knowing the sacred rites.

verses.transliteration: sa hi devo amartyo duvasyaty adhvarān |
verses.translation_english: For he, immortal God, honors the sacrifice with devotion.

verses.transliteration: agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanad draviṇasyur dadhe rayim |
verses.translation_english: Agni destroys obstacles and gives wealth to men.

verses.transliteration: agniṃ vo devayajyayā gṛṇānā yajñavāhasam |
verses.translation_english: We praise Agni, the bearer of offerings, through divine worship.

verses.transliteration: sa naḥ pāvaka dīdihi viśvāny arātiḥ |

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने सुपायनो भव सचा स्वस्तये सदा।
verses.transliteration: agne supāyano bhava sacā svastaye sadā |
verses.translation_english: Be easy of approach to us, O Agni, and ever present for our welfare.

verses.sanskrit_text: वैश्वानराय धिषणामृतावृधे घृतं न पूतमग्नये जनामसि। द्विता होताारं मनुषश्च वाघतो धिया रथं न कुलिशः सं हिनोमि॥
verses.transliteration: vaiśvānarāya dhiṣaṇām ṛtāvṛdhe ghṛtaṃ na pūtam agnaye janāmasi | dvitā hotāraṃ manuṣaś ca vāghato dhiyā rathaṃ na kuliśaḥ saṃ hinomi ||
verses.translation_english: To Vaiśvānara, increaser of holy law, we offer clarified butter like purified ghee to Agni. Him, the twofold Hotar of men, I impel with prayer as a charioteer urges on his car.

verses.sanskrit_text: स रोचते जनुषा पृथिव्या वैश्वानरो अग्निरमृतो न जातः।
verses.transliteration: sa rocate januṣā pṛthivyā vaiśvānaro agnir amṛto na jātaḥ |
verses.translation_english: Agni Vaiśvānara shines from his birth upon earth, immortal as though newly born.

verses.sanskrit_text: यस्य देवासो अधि विश्वे अस्मिन्नभि श्रवो दधिरे पुरूणि।
verses.transliteration: yasya devāso adhi viśve asminn abhi śravo dadhire purūṇi |
verses.translation_english: In him all the Gods have placed abundant glory.

verses.sanskrit_text: वैश्वानरं मनसा धीयते नरः स्वर्विदं शुचिमग्निं सुदक्षम्।
verses.transliteration: vaiśvānaraṃ manasā dhīyate naraḥ svarvidaṃ śucim agniṃ sudakṣam |
verses.translation_english: With mind the worshipper kindles Vaiśvānara, the radiant Agni, knower of heaven, skillful and pure.

verses.sanskrit_text: तमिद्धोता यजमानस्य सुव्रतो विश्वानि देव वयुनानि विद्वान्।
verses.transliteration: tam id dhotā yajamānasya suvrato viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān |
verses.translation_english: That Hotar of the worshipper, faithful to sacred law, knows all divine ordinances.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्विश्वानि कविक्रतुः पुरो हिता यज्ञस्य देवमृत्विजम्।
verses.transliteration: agnir viśvāni kavikratuḥ puro hitā yajñasya devam ṛtvijam |
verses.translation_english: Agni, wise in counsel, placed in front, the divine priest of the sacrifice, knows all things.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो अग्निः सुविताय प्र यच्छाद्विश्वानि देव वयुनानि विद्वान्।
verses.transliteration: sa no agniḥ suvitāya pra yacchād viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān |
verses.translation_english: May that Agni grant us prosperity, knowing all divine paths.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निं वो वृत्रहन्तमं पुरोहितं हवामहे। होतारं विश्ववेदसम्॥
verses.transliteration: agniṃ vo vṛtrahantamaṃ purohitaṃ havāmahe | hotāraṃ viśvavedasam ||
verses.translation_english: We call Agni, the slayer of foes, the household priest, the Hotar who knows all things.

verses.transliteration: yajñasya devam ṛtvijam agniṃ yajñasya ketum |
verses.translation_english: Agni, the divine priest of the sacrifice, the banner of the rite.

verses.transliteration: sa naḥ pāvaka dīdivo 'gne devān ihā vaha |
verses.translation_english: Shine for us, O purifying Agni, and bring the Gods here.

verses.sanskrit_text: यथा नो मित्रावरुणा यथा रुद्रो यथा मरुतः।
verses.transliteration: yathā no mitrāvaruṇā yathā rudro yathā marutaḥ |
verses.translation_english: So that Mitra and Varuṇa, Rudra and the Maruts may favor us.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने त्वं नो अन्तम उत त्राता शिवो भव।
verses.transliteration: agne tvaṃ no antam uta trātā śivo bhava |
verses.translation_english: Be thou our nearest friend, O Agni; be our protector and gracious.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने सुपायनो भव सचा स्वस्तये सदा।
verses.transliteration: agne supāyano bhava sacā svastaye sadā |
verses.translation_english: Be easy of approach to us, O Agni, and ever present for our welfare.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निं वो देवमग्निभिः सप्रथस्तममर्चत। होतारं विश्ववेदसम्॥
verses.transliteration: agniṃ vo devam agnibhiḥ saprathastamam arcata | hotāraṃ viśvavedasam ||
verses.translation_english: With your fires worship Agni, the most widely renowned God, the Hotar who knows all things.

verses.transliteration: agnir deveṣu vaḥ sadā vasoḥ puruhūtaḥ |
verses.translation_english: Agni, much-invoked, is ever among the Gods for you, bestower of treasures.

verses.transliteration: sa naḥ pāvaka dīdivo 'gne devān ihā vaha |
verses.translation_english: Shine for us, O purifying Agni, and bring the Gods here.

verses.sanskrit_text: यथा नो मित्रावरुणा यथा रुद्रो यथा मरुतः।
verses.transliteration: yathā no mitrāvaruṇā yathā rudro yathā marutaḥ |
verses.translation_english: So that Mitra and Varuṇa, Rudra and the Maruts may be gracious to us.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने त्वं नो अन्तम उत त्राता शिवो भव।
verses.transliteration: agne tvaṃ no antam uta trātā śivo bhava |
verses.translation_english: Be our nearest friend, O Agni; be our protector and gracious.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने सुपायनो भव सचा स्वस्तये सदा।
verses.transliteration: agne supāyano bhava sacā svastaye sadā |
verses.translation_english: Be easy of approach to us, O Agni, and ever present for our welfare.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होता कविक्रतुः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः। देवो देवेभिरा गमत्॥
verses.transliteration: agnir hotā kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ | devo devebhir ā gamat ||
verses.translation_english: Agni the Hotar, wise of purpose, true and most renowned—may the God come with the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: यज्ञस्य केतुं प्रथमं पुरोहितं अग्निं नरः। देवा अकृण्वन्नमृतम्॥
verses.transliteration: yajñasya ketuṃ prathamaṃ purohitaṃ agniṃ naraḥ | devā akṛṇvan amṛtam ||
verses.translation_english: Agni, first sign of sacrifice, the household priest—the Gods made him immortal.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो मन्द्राभिरध्वरे जिह्वाभिर्यजमानः। देवान् यक्षदिहागमत्॥
verses.transliteration: sa no mandrābhir adhvare jihvābhir yajamānaḥ | devān yakṣad ihā gamat ||
verses.translation_english: May he, with pleasant tongues at the sacrifice, worship the Gods and bring them here.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने त्वं नो अन्तम उत त्राता शिवो भव। वसुरग्ने वसूनाम्॥
verses.transliteration: agne tvaṃ no antama uta trātā śivo bhava | vasur agne vasūnām ||
verses.translation_english: Be thou our nearest friend, O Agni, our protector and gracious; Agni, bestower of treasures.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वमग्ने वाजसातमो विश्वान्यरातिः। अप द्विषो वि बाधसे॥
verses.transliteration: tvam agne vājasātamo viśvāny arātiḥ | apa dviṣo vi bādhase ||
verses.translation_english: Thou, Agni, art the best giver of strength; thou drivest away all hatred and hostility.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नः पावक दीदिवोऽग्ने सुविताय नः। विश्वानि देव वयुनानि विद्वान्॥
verses.transliteration: sa naḥ pāvaka dīdivo 'gne suvitāya naḥ | viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān ||
verses.translation_english: Shine for us, O purifying Agni, for our welfare; O God, knowing all ordinances.

verses.sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं वर्धन्तो अप्तुरः कृण्वाना यज्ञमुत्तमम्। स नो मघवा पुरुहूतः॥
verses.transliteration: indraṃ vardhanto apturaḥ kṛṇvānā yajñam uttamam | sa no maghavā puruhūtaḥ ||
verses.translation_english: Strengthening Indra, active and skillful, performing the highest sacrifice—may Maghavan, much-invoked, aid us.

verses.sanskrit_text: स इन्द्रः सोमपा एको वज्री वृत्राणि जिघ्नते।
verses.transliteration: sa indraḥ somapā eko vajrī vṛtrāṇi jighnate |
verses.translation_english: He, Indra, Soma-drinker, alone the wielder of the thunderbolt, slays the Vṛtras.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वं न इन्द्र वाजयुस्त्वं गव्युः शतक्रतो। त्वं हिरण्ययुः॥
verses.transliteration: tvaṃ na indra vājayus tvaṃ gavyuḥ śatakrato | tvaṃ hiraṇyayuḥ ||
verses.translation_english: Thou, O Indra of a hundred powers, art giver of strength, giver of cows, giver of gold.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वं हि शूरः सनिता विश्वस्य धनदा असि।
verses.transliteration: tvaṃ hi śūraḥ sanitā viśvasya dhanadā asi |
verses.translation_english: For thou art hero, winner of all, bestower of wealth.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वया ह स्विद्युजा वयं प्र वृत्राणि जघ्निम।
verses.transliteration: tvayā ha svid yujā vayaṃ pra vṛtrāṇi jaghnima |
verses.translation_english: With thee as ally we have smitten the Vṛtras.

verses.transliteration: tvam indrābhibhūr asi viśvā jātāny ojasā |
verses.translation_english: Thou, Indra, overpowerest all created things with might.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो वाजेषु नो धनेषु नो विश्वचर्षणे।
verses.transliteration: sa no vājeṣu no dhaneṣu no viśvacarṣaṇe |
verses.translation_english: Grant us success in battles, in wealth, and among all people.

verses.transliteration: indra tvotāsa ā vayaṃ havāmahe |
verses.translation_english: Indra, we call upon thee for aid.

verses.sanskrit_text: आ न इन्द्र महिमानं यजत्रा बृहन्तं गृणतः।
verses.transliteration: ā na indra mahimānaṃ yajatrā bṛhantaṃ gṛṇataḥ |
verses.translation_english: Come to us, O worshipful Indra, with thy great might.

verses.transliteration: indraḥ somasya pītaye |
verses.translation_english: Indra comes for the drinking of Soma.

verses.transliteration: yas te madaḥ pṛtanyati |
verses.translation_english: That exhilaration of thine battles fiercely.

verses.transliteration: indra vajrinn ojasā |
verses.translation_english: O Indra, wielder of the thunderbolt, with might.

verses.transliteration: tvaṃ na indra girvaṇaḥ |
verses.translation_english: Thou, Indra, lover of song.

verses.transliteration: tvam indrābhibhūr asi |
verses.translation_english: Thou art the overcomer, Indra.

verses.transliteration: indrāya somam indavaḥ |
verses.translation_english: The drops of Soma are for Indra.

verses.transliteration: tvaṃ hi naḥ pitā vaso |
verses.translation_english: Thou art our father, O giver of wealth.

verses.transliteration: abhi tvā śūra nonumaḥ |
verses.translation_english: We praise thee, O hero.

verses.transliteration: tvaṃ na indra satrā |
verses.translation_english: Thou art our constant aid, Indra.

verses.transliteration: indraṃ vayaṃ havāmahe |
verses.translation_english: Indra we call upon.

verses.transliteration: indrasya nu vīryāṇi |
verses.translation_english: Now the heroic deeds of Indra.

verses.transliteration: yaḥ śatrūn avadhīd indraḥ |
verses.translation_english: He who slew the foes—Indra.

verses.transliteration: sa naḥ pātu śatakratuḥ |
verses.translation_english: May the hundred-powered one protect us.

verses.transliteration: indraṃ vardhanto apturaḥ kṛṇvānā yajñam uttamam |
verses.translation_english: Strengthening Indra, the active ones perform the highest sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो महाँ अभि द्रुहो जघान विश्वचर्षणिः।
verses.transliteration: sa no mahāṃ abhi druho jaghāna viśvacarṣaṇiḥ |
verses.translation_english: May the mighty, all-ruling one smite those who harm us.

verses.transliteration: yo vṛtraṃ jaghnivān indraḥ śuṣṇam apāvṛṇot |
verses.translation_english: Indra who slew Vṛtra and laid low Śuṣṇa.

verses.sanskrit_text: स इन्नो वज्रिनं हवम् शृणोतु महिषो नृभिः।
verses.transliteration: sa in no vajrinaṃ havam śṛṇotu mahiṣo nṛbhiḥ |
verses.translation_english: May the mighty wielder of the thunderbolt hear our call.

verses.sanskrit_text: यो गा उदाजदपधिं यो अश्मनो अन्तरग्निना।
verses.transliteration: yo gā udājad apadhiṃ yo aśmano antar agninā |
verses.translation_english: He who released the cows and broke the enclosures of stone.

verses.transliteration: indraḥ puro dāsapatnīḥ apāvṛṇod ajāyata |
verses.translation_english: Indra shattered the cities of the Dasyus.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वं न इन्द्र वाजसातमः शतक्रतो मघोनाम्।
verses.transliteration: tvaṃ na indra vājasātamaḥ śatakrato maghonām |
verses.translation_english: Thou, Indra, best giver of strength, O hundred-powered, of the bountiful.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वं हि वृत्रहा वज्री नृम्णस्य दाता विश्वतः।
verses.transliteration: tvaṃ hi vṛtrahā vajrī nṛmṇasya dātā viśvataḥ |
verses.translation_english: Thou art the slayer of Vṛtra, the thunderbolt-bearer, giver of might everywhere.

verses.sanskrit_text: आ न इन्द्र गहि प्रिया सुतस्य पिब।
verses.transliteration: ā na indra gahi priyā sutasya piba |
verses.translation_english: Come to us, Indra; drink of the dear pressed Soma.

verses.sanskrit_text: सुतं ते इन्द्र वाजिनो मध्वः पिबा वृत्रहा।
verses.transliteration: sutaṃ te indra vājino madhvaḥ pibā vṛtrahā |
verses.translation_english: Drink the sweet pressed Soma, O Vṛtra-slayer.

verses.sanskrit_text: तं त्वा वयं हवामहे शतक्रतो रथेभिः।
verses.transliteration: taṃ tvā vayaṃ havāmahe śatakrato rathebhiḥ |
verses.translation_english: Thee we invoke, O hundred-powered, with chariots.

verses.transliteration: indrāya somam indavo madāya pari ṣicyate |
verses.translation_english: For Indra the Soma drops are poured for exhilaration.

verses.sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं वर्धन्तु नो गिरो विश्वा इदस्य कारवः।
verses.transliteration: indraṃ vardhantu no giro viśvā id asya kāravaḥ |
verses.translation_english: May our songs strengthen Indra, all these singers.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो विश्वानि वार्या दधातु राधसः।
verses.transliteration: sa no viśvāni vāryā dadhātu rādhasaḥ |
verses.translation_english: May he grant us all desirable treasures.

verses.transliteration: yad indra śravasyavo havāmahe |
verses.translation_english: When we call on Indra for glory.

verses.transliteration: ā no bharā ratheṣṭhām |
verses.translation_english: Bring to us the best in chariots.

verses.transliteration: tvaṃ na indrābhi gāḥ |
verses.translation_english: Do thou come unto us, O Indra.

verses.transliteration: pra tvā girvaṇo giraḥ |
verses.translation_english: To thee, lover of song, go our praises.

verses.transliteration: indraṃ sumnāya havāmahe |
verses.translation_english: We invoke Indra for favor.

verses.transliteration: śṛṇu no indra |
verses.translation_english: Hear us, O Indra.

verses.transliteration: maghavann indra tubhyam |
verses.translation_english: To thee, bountiful Indra.

verses.transliteration: indrāya namaḥ |
verses.translation_english: Homage to Indra.

verses.transliteration: indraṃ vardhanto apturaḥ kṛṇvānā yajñam uttamam |
verses.translation_english: Strengthening Indra, the active worshippers perform the highest sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो महाँ अभि द्रुहो जघान विश्वचर्षणिः।
verses.transliteration: sa no mahān abhi druho jaghāna viśvacarṣaṇiḥ |
verses.translation_english: May the mighty lord of all people smite those who seek to harm us.

verses.transliteration: yo vṛtraṃ jaghnivān indraḥ śuṣṇam apāvṛṇot |
verses.translation_english: Indra who slew Vṛtra and laid low Śuṣṇa.

verses.sanskrit_text: स इन्नो वज्रिनं हवम् शृणोतु महिषो नृभिः।
verses.transliteration: sa in no vajrinaṃ havam śṛṇotu mahiṣo nṛbhiḥ |
verses.translation_english: May the mighty thunderbolt-bearer hear our invocation.

verses.sanskrit_text: यो गा उदाजदपधिं यो अश्मनो अन्तरग्निना।
verses.transliteration: yo gā udājad apadhiṃ yo aśmano antar agninā |
verses.translation_english: He who released the cows and shattered the stone enclosures.

verses.transliteration: indraḥ puro dāsapatnīḥ apāvṛṇod ajāyata |
verses.translation_english: Indra broke open the strongholds of the Dasyus.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वं न इन्द्र वाजसातमः शतक्रतो मघोनाम्।
verses.transliteration: tvaṃ na indra vājasātamaḥ śatakrato maghonām |
verses.translation_english: Thou, Indra, best giver of strength, O hundred-powered, of the generous.

verses.sanskrit_text: त्वं हि वृत्रहा वज्री नृम्णस्य दाता विश्वतः।
verses.transliteration: tvaṃ hi vṛtrahā vajrī nṛmṇasya dātā viśvataḥ |
verses.translation_english: Thou art the slayer of Vṛtra, the thunderbolt-bearer, giver of might everywhere.

verses.sanskrit_text: आ न इन्द्र गहि प्रिया सुतस्य पिब।
verses.transliteration: ā na indra gahi priyā sutasya piba |
verses.translation_english: Come to us, Indra; drink of the dear pressed Soma.

verses.sanskrit_text: सुतं ते इन्द्र वाजिनो मध्वः पिबा वृत्रहा।
verses.transliteration: sutaṃ te indra vājino madhvaḥ pibā vṛtrahā |
verses.translation_english: Drink the sweet Soma, O Vṛtra-slayer.

verses.sanskrit_text: तं त्वा वयं हवामहे शतक्रतो रथेभिः।
verses.transliteration: taṃ tvā vayaṃ havāmahe śatakrato rathebhiḥ |
verses.translation_english: Thee we invoke, O hundred-powered, with our chariots.

verses.transliteration: indrāya somam indavo madāya pari ṣicyate |
verses.translation_english: For Indra the Soma drops are poured for exhilaration.

verses.sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं वर्धन्तु नो गिरो विश्वा इदस्य कारवः।
verses.transliteration: indraṃ vardhantu no giro viśvā id asya kāravaḥ |
verses.translation_english: May our hymns strengthen Indra, all these singers.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो विश्वानि वार्या दधातु राधसः।
verses.transliteration: sa no viśvāni vāryā dadhātu rādhasaḥ |
verses.translation_english: May he grant us all desirable treasures.

verses.transliteration: śṛṇu no indra maghavan |
verses.translation_english: Hear us, O bountiful Indra.

verses.sanskrit_text: प्र पर्वतानामुशती उपस्थादश्वे इव विषिते हासमाने। गावेव शुभ्रे मातरा रिहाणे विपाश् शुतुद्री पयसा जवेते॥
verses.transliteration: pra parvatānām uśatī upasthād aśve iva viṣite hāsamāne | gāveva śubhre mātara rihāṇe vipāś śutudrī payasā javete ||
verses.translation_english: From the lap of the mountains the two rivers rush forth, like eager horses released, like bright mother cows licking their calves — Vipāś and Śutudrī speed with their waters.

verses.sanskrit_text: इन्द्रेषिते प्रसवं भिक्षमाणे अच्छासमुद्रं रथ्येव यातः।
verses.transliteration: indreṣite prasavaṃ bhikṣamāṇe acchā samudraṃ rathy eva yātaḥ |
verses.translation_english: Impelled by Indra, seeking your course, you travel like chariots to the ocean.

verses.sanskrit_text: प्राचीना यज्ञमभि वर्धयन्ती मातरा शुभ्रे सुभगा सुवासा।
verses.transliteration: prācīnā yajñam abhi vardhayantī mātara śubhre subhagā suvāsā |
verses.translation_english: Flowing eastward, you nourish the sacrifice, bright mothers, fortunate and well-adorned.

verses.transliteration: vipāśaṃ śutudrīṃ sumatiṃ vadāmi |
verses.translation_english: I invoke with good will Vipāś and Śutudrī.

verses.transliteration: ā vo vṛṇe sumatiṃ viśvamitraḥ |
verses.translation_english: Viśvāmitra seeks your favor.

verses.transliteration: ati strutaṃ vahataḥ suprapāṇe |
verses.translation_english: Flow gently and allow us easy crossing.

verses.transliteration: upa bruve śṛṇutaṃ me vacāṃsi |
verses.translation_english: I address you; listen to my words.

verses.sanskrit_text: न मे स्तेनो जनपदो न व्यथिरस्ति।
verses.transliteration: na me steno janapado na vyathir asti |
verses.translation_english: There is no thief, no oppressor in my people.

verses.transliteration: ava śvetaṃ vahataṃ supratīke |
verses.translation_english: Lower your bright waves graciously.

verses.transliteration: yathā naḥ pāre taraṇāya syātam |
verses.translation_english: So that we may cross safely to the farther bank.

verses.transliteration: ā vo aśvā anayanta |
verses.translation_english: Our horses have brought us to you.

verses.transliteration: yathā na indraḥ sahāyaḥ |
verses.translation_english: As Indra is our helper.

verses.transliteration: suvasti naḥ pathiṣu santu |
verses.translation_english: May there be welfare for us upon our paths.

verses.transliteration: indraṃ vo vīrāḥ haviṣā vidhema |
verses.translation_english: O heroes, let us worship Indra with oblation.

verses.transliteration: yo vṛtrahā maghavā viśvavedāḥ |
verses.translation_english: He, the Vṛtra-slayer, the bountiful one, who knows all.

verses.transliteration: sa no vājaṃ dadhātu śatakratuḥ |
verses.translation_english: May the hundred-powered grant us strength.

verses.transliteration: yaḥ śuṣṇaṃ dasyuṃ jaghāna |
verses.translation_english: He who slew Śuṣṇa the foe.

verses.transliteration: yo gā apāvṛṇod apaḥ |
verses.translation_english: He who released the cows and the waters.

verses.transliteration: tvaṃ na indrābhi bhūḥ |
verses.translation_english: Do thou be with us, O Indra.

verses.transliteration: ā gahi somapītaye |
verses.translation_english: Come to drink the Soma.

verses.transliteration: indrāya somaḥ sutaḥ |
verses.translation_english: The Soma is pressed for Indra.

verses.transliteration: śṛṇu no havaṃ maghavan |
verses.translation_english: Hear our call, O bountiful one.

verses.transliteration: vajrin vājasātaye |
verses.translation_english: O thunderbolt-wielder, for the winning of strength.

verses.transliteration: indrāya namaḥ |
verses.translation_english: Homage to Indra.

verses.transliteration: ā tvā vayaṃ havāmahe śatakrato |
verses.translation_english: We call upon thee, O hundred-powered Indra.

verses.transliteration: maghavann indra somapītaye gahi |
verses.translation_english: O bountiful Indra, come for the drinking of Soma.

verses.transliteration: sutaṃ te indra madāya piba |
verses.translation_english: Drink the pressed Soma for exhilaration.

verses.transliteration: tvaṃ hi vṛtrahā vajrī |
verses.translation_english: For thou art the slayer of Vṛtra, bearer of the thunderbolt.

verses.transliteration: yo gā apāvṛṇod dhanam |
verses.translation_english: Who released the cows and wealth.

verses.transliteration: sa no vājaṃ dadhātu |
verses.translation_english: May he grant us strength and prize.

verses.transliteration: śṛṇu no havaṃ maghavan |
verses.translation_english: Hear our invocation, O bountiful one.

verses.transliteration: ā gahi priyaṃ sutam |
verses.translation_english: Come to the dear pressed Soma.

verses.transliteration: indrāya somaḥ sutaḥ |
verses.translation_english: The Soma is pressed for Indra.

verses.transliteration: vajrin vājasātaye |
verses.translation_english: O thunderbolt-wielder, for winning strength.

verses.transliteration: indrāya namaḥ |
verses.translation_english: Homage to Indra.

verses.transliteration: indraṃ vo vīrāḥ haviṣā vidhema |
verses.translation_english: O heroes, let us worship Indra with oblation.

verses.transliteration: ā gahi somapītaye |
verses.translation_english: Come to drink the Soma.

verses.transliteration: maghavann indra śṛṇu naḥ |
verses.translation_english: O bountiful Indra, hear us.

verses.transliteration: tvaṃ hi vṛtrahā vajrī |
verses.translation_english: For thou art the slayer of Vṛtra, bearer of the thunderbolt.

verses.transliteration: yo gā apāvṛṇod dhanam |
verses.translation_english: Who released the cows and wealth.

verses.transliteration: sa no vājaṃ dadhātu |
verses.translation_english: May he grant us strength.

verses.transliteration: śatakrato maghavan |
verses.translation_english: O hundred-powered, O bountiful one.

verses.transliteration: indrāya somaḥ sutaḥ |
verses.translation_english: The Soma is pressed for Indra.

verses.transliteration: indrāya namaḥ |
verses.translation_english: Homage to Indra.

verses.transliteration: ā tvā vayaṃ havāmahe śatakrato |
verses.translation_english: We invoke thee, O hundred-powered Indra.

verses.transliteration: maghavann indra somapītaye gahi |
verses.translation_english: O bountiful Indra, come for Soma-drinking.

verses.transliteration: sutaṃ te indra madāya piba |
verses.translation_english: Drink the pressed Soma for exhilaration.

verses.transliteration: tvaṃ hi vṛtrahā vajrī |
verses.translation_english: Thou art the slayer of Vṛtra, bearer of the thunderbolt.

verses.transliteration: yo gā apāvṛṇod dhanam |
verses.translation_english: Who released the cows and wealth.

verses.transliteration: sa no vājaṃ dadhātu |
verses.translation_english: May he grant us strength.

verses.transliteration: śṛṇu no havaṃ maghavan |
verses.translation_english: Hear our call, O bountiful one.

verses.transliteration: indrāya somaḥ sutaḥ |
verses.translation_english: The Soma is pressed for Indra.

verses.transliteration: indrāya namaḥ |
verses.translation_english: Homage to Indra.

verses.transliteration: indraṃ vayaṃ mahādhanam havāmahe |
verses.translation_english: We invoke Indra, the great bestower of wealth.

verses.transliteration: yo vṛtrahā śatakratuḥ |
verses.translation_english: He who slew Vṛtra, the hundred-powered.

verses.transliteration: sa no vājaṃ dadhātu maghavā |
verses.translation_english: May the bountiful one grant us strength.

verses.transliteration: ā gahi somapītaye |
verses.translation_english: Come to drink the Soma.

verses.transliteration: sutaṃ te indra madāya piba |
verses.translation_english: Drink the pressed Soma for joy.

verses.transliteration: śṛṇu no havaṃ vajrin |
verses.translation_english: Hear our call, O thunderbolt-bearer.

verses.transliteration: tvaṃ na indrābhi bhūḥ |
verses.translation_english: Be thou with us, O Indra.

verses.transliteration: yo gā apāvṛṇod apaḥ |
verses.translation_english: He who released the cows and waters.

verses.transliteration: śatakrato maghavan |
verses.translation_english: O hundred-powered, bountiful one.

verses.transliteration: indrāya namaḥ |
